label: 奨学院
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
説明文: Private" institute of learning for members of the Minamoto lineage. The Minamoto with the highest rank (choja) was appointed as the betto of this institution, and this included both Kitabatake Chikafusa and Ashikaga Yoshimitsu."
